mapper.insert:
/* addHistory */ /* 이력 추가 */ INSERT INTO MN_IMPRMN_H (PV_UNQCODE, DEVICE_CODE, DEVICE_UNQNO, DETAIL_DEVICE_NM, IMPRMN_NOTE) VALUES
(#{item.pvUnqcode}, #{item.deviceCode}, #{item.deviceUnqno}, #{item.detailDeviceNm}, #{item.imprmnNote})

/* addManual */ /* 매뉴얼 추가 */ INSERT INTO MN_IMPRMN_MANUAL (DEVICE_CODE, DEVICE_NM, DETAIL_DEVICE_NM, FILE_URL) VALUES
(#{manual.deviceCode}, #{manual.deviceNm}, #{manual.detailDeviceNm}, #{manual.fileUrl})
